text:
BUILDING.txt states that the property 'tomcat.output' is in the build.properties file.
It isn't; tomcat.output is in build.xml

Of course it is not there, you have to create the build.properties file by yourselves. The instruction is correct.

[quote]
(3.2) Building

 1. The build is controlled by creating a ${tomcat.source}/build.properties
    file.
[/quote]

For reference:
http://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/property.html
